name: Monster Adventurer
description:
This is my second game.
This is a turn-based game.

The protagonist is an old man.
Pursue your dreams and be an adventurer.
Without any setbacks, he became an adventurer.
It started adventurer life. Teammate System
The protagonist can recruit two teammates and about 35 teammates can be recruited.
You must activate your teammates before they appear on the recruitable list. Skill System
Skills in addition to MP consumption, there is TP consumption
MP can be recovered by potion, rest,
TP can only be recovered by fighting
The more advanced skills, the more TP needed backpack system
The team has a common backpack that cannot be used in combat.
Each person has a separate backpack that can be used in combat. Dot Adding System
Role upgrades can earn points that can be used to increase ability values. Skill Learning System
Role upgrades have access to points that can be used to learn their skills.
The skills that everyone can learn are different. Card System
Each monster has two cards.
One is a summon card that can summon this monster to help.
The other is a transfiguration card that can be transformed into a monster to help out. Mission System
Only after the association accepts the mission can we go to the wild and perform the mission
Accepting the task requires a deposit. No deposit cannot accept the task.
Complete the mission to gain reputation
Mission failure will lose reputation
Reputation increases the adventurer level.
Prestige is too low will reduce the adventurer level. Working System
Can go to the store, work.
It is a way to get money by hanging up.
